channel.title: Poetry on Luke M Perez
channel.description: Recent content in Poetry on Luke M Perez

item.title: A Promise to California
item.description: A PROMISE to California, Also to the great Pastoral Plains, and for Oregon: Sojourning east a while longer, soon I travel toward you, to remain, to teach robust American love; For I know very well that I and robust love belong among you, inland, and along the Western Sea; For These States tend inland, and toward the Western Seaâ€”and I will also. —Walt Whitman Nice motto for the homeland.
